title: Shell Prompt Anatomy
description: An interactive diagram that helps students recognize and understand each component of a typical Linux shell prompt, including username, hostname, current directory, and user indicator symbols.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Linux
Terminal
Shell
Command Line
learningObjectives: Remember the six main components of a Linux shell prompt
Identify whether logged in as a normal user or root user
Recognize prompts from different Linux distributions
prerequisites: Basic familiarity with opening a terminal

controls.description: Hover over prompt components to see detailed explanations
Click on a component to lock the selection

controls.name: Prompt Style
controls.description: Choose between different prompt display styles

limitations: Does not cover all possible prompt customizations
Does not show prompt configuration (PS1 variable)
